snippet: We still can’t seem to figure out what to call two people who act as if they are married but are not. Well, there’s got to be something better than POSSLQ.
abstract: Many couples living together under one roof, who choose not to marry or cannot marry, do not know what to call their faux spouse; terms some people use like partner and POSSLQ, or 'person of opposite sex sharing living quarters', are considered too inadequate to describe these relationships.
lead_paragraph: We still can’t seem to figure out what to call two people who act as if they are married but are not. Well, there’s got to be something better than POSSLQ.

headline.seo: Unmarried Spouses Have a Way With Words
headline.main: Unmarried Spouses Have a Way With Words
headline.print_headline: Unmarried Spouses Have a Way With Words
